segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, quite detailed in its line drawing style.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are three people present: an adult woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My gaze is drawn immediately to the sink on the right side of the frame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet and the basin is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge of the sink in a steady sheet onto the cabinets below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is definitely forming and widening on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands right in front of the sink, busy drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the chaos happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite alarming to witness this scene unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing that plate, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to notice the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This really feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
